extendedInfo.description: AudioWalks MunichExperience Munich in a completely new way â explore the city and its history via AudioWalk on your Smartphone. This acoustic travel guide accompanies you to all the sights of Munich: Marienplatz, the Frauenkirche, TheatinerstraÃe, the HofbrÃ¤uhaus and the Viktualienmarkt are just some of the stops on your walking tour of the Bavarian capital. Top chef Alfons Schuhbeck will tell you about Bavariaâs famous WeiÃwurst, or white sausage, and how it came to be created, and the fascination of the Viktualienmarkt. Sports fans are also well catered for, with former Bayern Munich star Hassan Salihamidzic portraying the end-of-season celebrations on the balcony of Munich town hall from a championâs point of view, celebrations that he himself once experienced in a state of almost total nudity.Enjoy this AudioWalk through one of Germanyâs most beautiful cities.
